Action.author: binhn
Action.body: ~ryjones appreciate if you could point us in the right direction to get a boatload (1000s) of nodes created for the test.

Action.author: ryjones
Action.body: ~binhn I've reached out internally to see who needs to talk to whom to get this rolling.

Action.author: ryjones
Action.body: Please make your request here ASAP: https://github.com/cncf/cluster

Action.author: bmos299
Action.body: Thanks Ry. We will do that.
